snippet.title: DISTANT: First Look at Gameplay
snippet.description:
Traverse fantastical, colourful worlds and uncover their secrets. Here's a first look at DISTANT gameplay! 

Facebook: http://facebook.com/distantgame
Twitter: http://twitter.com/playdistant
Instagram: http://instagram.com/playdistant

Music by www.jordanchinmusic.com
